pullRequest.title: Complete RecipesProvider mapping
pullRequest.bodyText: Most of these are pretty trivial once you understand the code.

nodes.bodyText:

nodes.bodyText: How does this differ from the other offerPlanksRecipe? (for example, is it only used for fungus planks or wooden planks)
